description:
Aichi`s wins in the Asia Circuit have him face off against Leon once more in the finals...... And after some time, Aichi`s now a high school student! However, Vanguard isn`t popular at all in Miyaji Academy, the school he has enrolled in.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: スタンドアップ! ハイスクール・ライフ!!
